document.full_text: the mets were front and center again on sunday night as fans stood in unison and began chanting 'u.s.a.!' when news of osama bin laden's death began to spread.
document.title: catharsis comes once again with mets on the field
lines_and_colors: the mets were front and center again on sunday night as fans stood in unison and began chanting 'u.s.a.!' when news of osama bin laden's death began to spread.
